ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would recommend this class to a fellow student.

Yes, I would recommend it. The course covers some major texts for anyone doing postcolonial or just literary theory in general, but it is placed in the francophone context, which is something that would not (or perhaps could not) be explained in the same way in an English department.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: The course both deepened my knowledge of my discipline and contributed to my personal research.

I don't believe it will contribute to my dissertation, but it exposed me to a broader conceptionof African diasporic literature. The material from this course will probably filter into my orals lists.
